column3:
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16080/commits/8afca323e371a7a191d874928046d6bf2fbbe072

Looks like the descriptors were bumped in #15528.
I don't think it's necessary to backport release process changes.
Agree that this doesn't need backport

Thanks!\n\nI mentioned backporting because in the tagged v0.18.0 release, PACKAGE_VERSION and PACKAGE_STRING in build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h are still set to 0.17 which may (or may not) cause issues for Visual Studio builds (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11526).

utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/8afca323e371a7a191d874928046d6bf2fbbe072.

Changing the PACKAGE* settings won't cause any problems for the msvc build. 

It's not strictly needed to update the build_msvc/bitcoin_config.h as part of the release process since the msvc build is for development/testing purposes only and neither it nor any artifacts produced from it are ever incl
